input.sentences: we took all of our family up to the farm for the reunion .
everybody was there . there were so many people .
one of my uncles set up a keyboard for some music .
afterward we all made tents so we could sleep .
output.sentences: Everyone gathered at the farm for the family reunion.
Family members had a chance to catch up and visit with each other.
The uncles set up and played some music for the crowd.
They played background music to keep the party lively.
Afterward, they set up tents to sleep at the farm overnight.
